name: Monster Mansion (itch) (opacut)
description: This is a short horror story written in Twine using SugarCube. All the images are generated using Midjourney AI (https://www.midjourney.com/home/). I recommend playing a "scary house soundtrack" or similar youtube video in the background - I don't have audio files figured out yet.  Alternatively, you could use Ambient Chaos (https://neal.fun/ambient-chaos/) to set up a dark and stormy night. Enjoy!
